example.text: Republicans in Congress are holding our economy hostage to pass their extreme agenda — no matter what it costs the American people. A GOP default crisis would be a disaster for IL-11 and our country. [[url]]

If we want to make progress on this issue, we can no longer tolerate inaction – we need bipartisan compromise. We must effectively secure our border while respecting the humanity of the children and families who try to migrate here. [[url]]

Over the past two years, my office has secured over $45 million for important community projects throughout our District, and I'm committed to working to make sure the 11th District continues to receive its fair share of federal resources. My constituents want leaders who work together to find common ground and solve challenges.
We need a permanent solution to the toxic brinkmanship surrounding the debt ceiling. That's why I introduced legislation to repeal it and end the threat of default once and for all. [[url]]
I look forward to reviewing the details of this agreement. [[url]]
